00016  #define BEG( string ) trace << &(spaces[60 - indent]) << "> " << string << endl; indent += 3;
00017  #define END( string ) indent -= 3; trace << &(spaces[60 - indent]) << "< " << string << endl
00018  #define TRACE( string ) trace << &(spaces[60 - indent]) << string << endl;
00019 #else
00020  #define BEG( string )
00021  #define END( string )
00022  #define TRACE( string )
00023 #endif
